scene.description: Ultra-photorealistic mirror selfie in a modern bathroom. Young Asian woman taking a playful selfie with a compact digital camera.

elements: white door slightly open in background
environment.lighting: soft warm overhead bathroom light, flattering on skin, subtle shadows

photography.camera_style: compact digital camera mirror selfie – camera held in right hand, visible in mirror reflection
photography.texture: hyper-realistic skin, fabric details, sharp mirror reflection

subject.appearance: A young and attractive Asian woman in her early 20s

pose.overall: standing in front of mirror, right arm raised holding compact camera to eye level for selfie, left arm relaxed by side
pose.torso: slightly turned, off-shoulder sweatshirt exposing one shoulder

subject.expression: soft confident pout with glossy lips, eyes looking directly at camera, subtle playful vibe
subject.hair: long dark hair in sleek high ponytail, smooth and straight with center part

clothing.top: oversized light grey sweatshirt with large black '14' print on front, worn off one shoulder, sleeves long and loose

subject.accessories: small gold hoop earrings, thin gold necklace, black compact digital camera held in right hand

requirements: Long dark hair in sleek high ponytail with center part
Oversized light grey sweatshirt with black '14' print, worn off one shoulder
Small gold hoop earrings and thin gold necklace
Holding black compact digital camera in right hand for mirror selfie
Soft confident pout looking at camera
Modern bathroom mirror setting with white door, towel, frosted window
